f:I[63327,["/_next/static/chunks/2fd32df42ef26f8b.js","/_next/static/chunks/f501513783488158.js"],"default"]
10:T13ad,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Example: Multi-Registry Setup</h1>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Overview</h2>
Set up multiple Docker registries with different configurations using docker run commands.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Step 1: Create Network</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Create Docker network
docker network create registry-net
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Step 2: Start Multiple Registries</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Development registry (no auth)
docker run -d --name registry-dev --network registry-net -p 5001:5000 \
  -e REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED=true \
  registry:2
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Staging registry (no auth)</h1>
docker run -d --name registry-staging --network registry-net -p 5002:5000 \
  -e REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED=true \
  registry:2
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Production registry (no auth)</h1>
docker run -d --name registry-prod --network registry-net -p 5003:5000 \
  -e REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED=true \
  registry:2
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Step 3: Test Registries</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Test all registries
curl http://localhost:5001/v2/_catalog
curl http://localhost:5002/v2/_catalog
curl http://localhost:5003/v2/_catalog
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Push test images</h1>
docker pull alpine:3.18
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Push to development</h1>
docker tag alpine:3.18 localhost:5001/dev/alpine:test
docker push localhost:5001/dev/alpine:test
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Push to staging</h1>
docker tag alpine:3.18 localhost:5002/staging/alpine:test
docker push localhost:5002/staging/alpine:test
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Push to production</h1>
docker tag alpine:3.18 localhost:5003/prod/alpine:test
docker push localhost:5003/prod/alpine:test
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Step 4: Start Registry UI</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Create multi-registry config
cat  registries.config.json
{
  "registries": [
    {
      "name": "Development",
      "api": "http://registry-dev:5000"
    },
    {
      "name": "Staging",
      "api": "http://registry-staging:5000"
    },
    {
      "name": "Production",
      "api": "http://registry-prod:5000"
    }
  ]
}
EOF
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Start Registry UI</h1>
docker run -d --name registry-ui --network registry-net -p 5000:5000 \
  -v $(pwd)/registries.config.json:/app/registries.config.json:ro \
  -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data \
  ghcr.io/vibhuvioio/docker-registry-ui:latest
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Alternative: Docker Compose</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Download multi-registry compose
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VibhuviOiO/docker-registry-ui/refs/heads/main/docker/docker-compose-multi-registry.yml
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Start all services</h1>
docker-compose -f docker-compose-multi-registry.yml up -d
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Access</h2>

<strong class="text-gray-900">Registry UI:</strong> http://localhost:5000
<strong class="text-gray-900">Development Registry:</strong> http://localhost:5001
<strong class="text-gray-900">Staging Registry:</strong> http://localhost:5002
<strong class="text-gray-900">Production Registry:</strong> http://localhost:5003
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Cleanup</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Stop and remove containers
docker stop registry-ui registry-dev registry-staging registry-prod
docker rm registry-ui registry-dev registry-staging registry-prod
docker network rm registry-net
rm -f registries.config.json
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Next Steps</h2>

<a href="example-basic-auth.html" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">Add Authentication to Registries</a>
<a href="configuration.html" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">Advanced Configuration Options</a>
<a href="security.html" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">Security Best Practices</a>6:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$Lf",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Getting Started","items":[{"id":"getting-started","title":"Installation","slug":"getting-started"},{"id":"configuration","title":"Configuration","slug":"configuration"}]},{"title":"Features","items":[{"id":"features","title":"Overview","slug":"features"},{"id":"security","title":"Security Scanning","slug":"security"},{"id":"bulk-operations","title":"Bulk Operations","slug":"bulk-operations"}]},{"title":"Examples","items":[{"id":"multi-registry","title":"Multi-Registry Setup","slug":"examples/multi-registry"},{"id":"basic-auth","title":"Basic Auth Registry","slug":"examples/basic-auth"}]},{"title":"Reference","items":[{"id":"api","title":"API Integration","slug":"api"},{"id":"development","title":"Development","slug":"development"},{"id":"testing","title":"Testing Guide","slug":"testing"}]}],"basePath":"/docker-registry-ui","title":"$undefined"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-8","children":["$","$L5",null,{"href":"/docker-registry-ui","className":"text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 flex items-center gap-1","children":"← Back to Docker Registry UI"}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Multi-Registry Setup"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-600 text-lg mb-8","children":"Multi-Registry Setup for Docker Registry UI"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$10"}}]]}]]}]}]]}]
b:[["$","meta","0",{"charSet":"utf-8"}],["$","meta","1",{"name":"viewport","content":"width=device-width, initial-scale=1"}]]
